name: Tejas Yogesh Pawar
summary: Data scientist with a strong foundation in Python, ETL, Experimental Design, and Machine Learning for analyzing business needs, executing process improvements, and supporting decision-making, with a track record of successful project completion.

work_authorization.status: Authorized to work in the United States
work_authorization.details: Currently on F1 STEM OPT, eligible to work for any employer for 3 years without sponsorship.
work_authorization.sponsorship_preference: Would appreciate visa sponsorship if possible.
work_authorization.employment_type: Open to full-time or contract-based opportunities.

masters.degree: Master of Science in Applied Data Analytics
coursework: Designing and Implementing a Data Warehouse
Advanced Machine Learning and Neural Networks

responsibilities: Cut data scientist workload 65% via problem-solving RAG system with AWS Lambda, LangChain, Feast meeting customer needs
Boosted model F1 25% by tuning PyTorch, TensorFlow transformers; pruned, quantized, compiled via TorchServe GPUs, ONNX
Built fault-tolerant ML pipelines on AWS (Spark, S3, Kinesis) with Kubernetes autoscaling; reduced SLA violations by 40%
Implemented AI data quality checks using custom validation rules and schema enforcement to ensure robust model performance
Established ML observability with MLflow, DVC, and Delta Lake; improved feature reuse and cut debugging time by 50%
Used Agile practices and Git CI/CD with Jira to streamline generative AI microservice releases, reducing iteration time by 30%
Delivered 85% accurate real-time sentiment classifier, cutting CRM triage 15%, via BERT, PySpark, TensorFlow NLP stream
Achieved 35% lift in marketing ROI by centralizing customer lakehouse data in Databricks SQL dashboards, visualization, automation
Clustered customers into 5 segments using PCA and k-means, improving targeted email CTR by up to 22% in pilot tests
Led A/B tests using uplift modeling in Spark SQL, identifying strategies contributing to $1.3M potential revenue impact
Maintained 99.9% model uptime by automating CI/CD with AWS SageMaker, Docker, MLflow, Prometheus alerts
Enabled 30% faster C-suite decisions via interactive Power BI dashboards with DAX, storytelling, drilldowns, KPIs
Promoted to Innovation Lab Leader; delivered 4 ML solutions in 6 months, driving product OKRs and cross-functional sprints
Mapped customer needs via data storytelling; set KPIs with experimental design, cutting churn by 12%
Queried databases and NoSQL logs; engineered features with statistics and ML, lifting model F1 by 18%
Built ARIMA, Decision Trees, Random Forest, XGBoost, LSTM; improved accuracy through data modeling and problem-solving
Automated Airflow DAGs on cloud; shipped data structures 30% faster with version control
Delivered BI stack; dashboards with KPIs cut decision time by two weeks
Analyzed 50+ clinical studies; synthesized features, lifting AUROC by 8% in trials
Preprocessed ~100GB healthcare data via PySpark, Pandas, SQL; cut training time 30% and improved accuracy by 10%
Automated 80% of data wrangling; reduced reporting latency 35% via KPI analytics
Fixed anomalies via Z-score, control charts, and SQL ETL; raised dataset accuracy to 95%
Improved model F1 20% via data cleansing; used chi-square and ANOVA for feature selection
Built React-Firebase uploader ingesting 5k rows/min; cut SKU ingest time 70% via CI/CD
Implemented Node.js promo engine with Stripe coupons and Redis; +18% conversion, +22% revenue

projects.title: Personal Assistant Conversational Q&A Chatbot
description: Engineered and deployed a personal assistant chatbot utilizing OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo model, showcasing proficiency in natural language processing, model integration, and deploying AI solutions to production environments.

Implemented end-to-end machine learning workflows—including data preprocessing, API development, and backend integration on Hugging Face Spaces—demonstrating expertise in building scalable machine learning applications.

projects.title: Text To Image Generation App
description: Fine-tuned the Stable Diffusion XL model using a specialized science diagrams multimodal dataset, enhancing its efficiency for accurate image generation; deployed the model via Amazon SageMaker for robust scalability.
Developed an iOS app with Xcode integrating this advanced AI model for seamless text-to-image conversions.

projects.title: Identification of Bullying Victims Using Data Mining Techniques
description: Reduced a complex dataset of 204 attributes to 31 essential features using LASSO and ANOVA F-test, significantly improving predictive performance.
Applied hyperparameter tuning and rigorous model evaluation across nine ML models, selecting logistic regression for balanced accuracy.

projects.title: Digital Logistic System: The Next Generation Transport System - Robotics
description: Developed a line-following robot using Arduino, ultrasonic and infrared sensors, and C++ programming, showcasing robotics and embedded systems.
Integrated AI/ML with Python, MQTT for IoT communications, and ROS simulations to enhance logistics efficiency and reduce costs.

projects.title: Barbie With Brains
description: Built an interactive virtual assistant using an RNN for speech recognition, integrated into a toy for educational engagement.
Added storytelling, counting, word spelling, and reminder features via Mycroft API.

projects.title: Image Processing for Diabetic Retinopathy Prediction
description: Developed a 52-layer MobileNetV2 CNN to classify retinal images, achieving 74.93% test accuracy.
Classified five stages of retinopathy: None, Mild, Moderate, Severe, Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy.

certifications: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate (in progress)
